context.Data.SetProperty("Neo", "OriginalMessage", originalMessage); System.DateTime dt; System.DateTime.TryParse(dateTime, out dt); if (dt.Kind != System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified) { if (dt.Year != 0001) { context.Properties[dateTimeMeaning.ToString()] = dt.ToUniversalTime().ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ"); } else { context.Properties[dateTimeMeaning.ToString()] = dateTime; } context.Data.SetProperty("Neo", "DateTimeValid", "True"); } else { context.Data.SetProperty("Neo", "DateTimeValid", "False"); } if(context.Instance.IsDebugEnabled){ context.Instance.TraceDebug(" Validate Date Time Format - Message ID: " + context.Data.Header.MessageId.ToString() + " SourceSystemID: " + sourceSystemID + " Date Time Meaning: " + dateTimeMeaning + " Date Time Value: " + dateTime); string eSBTopic = context.Data.Header.Topic; eSBTopic = eSBTopic.Replace("Enrich_", "") + "-Errors"; string sourceSystemID = context.Data.GetProperty ("Neo", "SourceSystemID"); string plantID = context.Data.GetProperty ("Neo", "PlantCodeID");
